attributes.action: Children with SEND to be able to access educational provision and support
attributes.background: Since the SEND reforms in 2014 far too many children with special educational needs and disabilities, are unable to access the correct education and support that they require. Many families face costly tribunals battling for their children to be able to access an education.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
